fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data

Interface IKey


  • public interface IKey
    Defines a record key, usually (but not always) a single integer field.

    The key value is immutable (it can be used for fetching data or for retrieving the original key value used when fetching). The key state can be either "fetched" or "unfetched". After being fetched, the key is associated with a data structure (such as a database record) and can be used to retrieve the identifying attributes (such as a simple or composite primary key value).

    If the actual data structure is modified after fetching, the key will not reflect changes to the data structure (in other words, it remembers the key used to fetch the record and ignores modified values for the cell data defining the key). Once the key has been fetched, it cannot transition back to the "unfetched" state.

    Thread safety: implementations are required to be safe for concurrent read/write access.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<String> getCellNames()
      Gets the list of cell names that define the key.
      ICellStructure getCellStructure()
      Gets the cell structure with which the key is associated.
      Object getCellValue()
      Shortcut to get the value of the key, for keys based on a single value.
      Object getCellValue(String cellName)
      Gets the value of a key cell, used for fetching.
      IDataStructure getDataStructure()
      Gets the cell data structure with which the key is associated after fetching data.
      int getIntValue()
      Shortcut to get the integer value of the key, for keys based on a single integer cell.
      UUID getUuidValue()
      Shortcut to get the UUID value of the key, for keys based on a single UUID cell.
      boolean isFetched()
      Determines if the key is associated with a fetched data structure.

    • Method Detail

      • getCellStructure

        ICellStructure getCellStructure()
        Gets the cell structure with which the key is associated.
        Returns:
        the non-null cell structure.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        getDataStructure()

      • getDataStructure

        IDataStructure getDataStructure()
        Gets the cell data structure with which the key is associated after fetching data.
        Returns:
        the data structure, or null if unfetched.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        getCellStructure(), isFetched()

      • isFetched

        boolean isFetched()
        Determines if the key is associated with a fetched data structure.
        Returns:
        true if the data defined by the key has been fetched, otherwise false.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getCellNames

        List<String> getCellNames()
        Gets the list of cell names that define the key.
        Returns:
        a list containing at least one element.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        getCellValue(String)

      • getCellValue

        Object getCellValue(String cellName)
             throws IllegalArgumentException
        Gets the value of a key cell, used for fetching.
        Parameters:
        cellName - the name of the cell, which must be defined by getCellNames().
        Returns:
        the cell value. This yields the same value as calling IData.getValue() on the named cell.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the name does not correspond to a key cell.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        getCellNames(), getCellValue(), getIntValue(), getUuidValue()

      • getCellValue

        Object getCellValue()
             throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Shortcut to get the value of the key, for keys based on a single value.
        Returns:
        the value of the key.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the key is composed of multiple cells.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        getCellValue(String), getIntValue(), getUuidValue()

      • getIntValue

        int getIntValue()
         throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Shortcut to get the integer value of the key, for keys based on a single integer cell.
        Returns:
        the integer value of the key.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the key is non-integer or if it is composed of multiple cells.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        getCellValue(String), IIntegerData

      • getUuidValue

        UUID getUuidValue()
           throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Shortcut to get the UUID value of the key, for keys based on a single UUID cell.
        Returns:
        the UUID value of the key.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the key is not a UUID or if it is composed of multiple cells.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        getCellValue(String), IUuidData
